= Build Instructions =

#1. Download and install iPhone SDK >= 2.1
#2. Download ffmpeg from svn (replace -r16669 with the revision you want)

{{{
svn checkout svn://svn.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg/trunk -r16669 ffmpeg
}}}

#3. Use a configure script from the Download section

{{{
patch -p4 -i ffmpeg4iphone-svn-2009-30-01-v0.0.4.patch
./configure-iphone-v0.0.4
}}}
